title: Just won 2 ranked games with S and S-, no hexchest?
body:
Hi Riot staffs,

I have just won 2 ranked games with S and S-, but I got no hexchest.
The 4 hexchest icons are up in my profile.
If I play with my friend with premade team and my friend got S rank, I didnt get hexchest too.
Can you please check if I miss something?
Thank you

Note: I am not under punishment period or some sort of it.

Regards,
me

replies.body:
Had you already earned a chest with the champion you were playing? You can only earn one chest per champion per season, and regardless of where the S is, the chest will count on the champion that YOU are playing. 

You can see if you've already earned a chest on that champ in your profile, they'll have a little fancy gold border around them.
oh right. I get it now. Thanks
